plot: Three actresses "accidentally" became cult horror film icons in the late 1980s and created the modern interpretation of the "Scream Queen" image.
title: Screaming in High Heels: The Rise & Fall of the Scream Queen Era
plot_es: Three actresses "accidentally" became cult horror film icons in the late 1980s and created the modern interpretation of the "Scream Queen" image.
original_name: Screaming in High Heels: The Rise & Fall of the Scream Queen Era
plot_en: Three actresses "accidentally" became cult horror film icons in the late 1980s and created the modern interpretation of the "Scream Queen" image.
